entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Rocky Mountain House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 1:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local smoke early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
